name: Cube Samurai: RUN!
description: Run, jump and slash your way through this endless runner! Race through galactic environments as you try to stop the Evil Pyramid and his Cone Trooper army. Earn, purchase and upgrade your hero’s costumes, weapons, and special powers to help you be the greatest warrior in all of space and time!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Storage: 200 MB available space
